snippet: The creator of the series, "Friday Night Lights," accused Mitt Romney of plagiarism for adopting the slogan, "Clear Eyes, Full Hearts, Can't Lose,'' and asked him to stop using it.
abstract: The creator of the series, "Friday Night Lights," accused Mitt Romney of plagiarism for adopting the slogan, "Clear Eyes, Full Hearts, Can't Lose,'' and asked him to stop using it.

headline.main: 'Friday Night Lights' Creator Accuses Romney of Plagiarism
headline.print_headline: TV Show Creator Complains to Romney
